description: Lists the tags associated with an Athena resource.

parameters.name: ResourceARN
parameters.description: Lists the tags for the resource with the specified ARN.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The list of tags associated with the specified resource.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: A tag key. The tag key length is from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in UTF-8. You can use letters and numbers representable in UTF-8, and the following characters: + - = . _ : / @. Tag keys are case-sensitive and must be unique per resource.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: A tag value. The tag value length is from 0 to 256 Unicode characters in UTF-8. You can use letters and numbers representable in UTF-8, and the following characters: + - = . _ : / @. Tag values are case-sensitive.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token to be used by the next request if this request is truncated.
